item.title: About me
item.author: thomas@tiveron.ca (Thomas Tiveron)
item.description:
Hello, my name is Thomas,

I started this website to track different problems I have been able to solve. These can range from IT problems (networking), to administration (mostly Windows), to almost anything tech related! Most of the solutions I have and will write about are ones that I couldn’t find a good solution for with our trusty friend Google.

So my hope is that you are here because you too had a problem and one of my solutions has helped you out.
